participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise, with a playful spirit. She has a deep appreciation for the beauty of life and enjoys indulging in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i am 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is adventurous and enthusiastic about life. He has a zest for trying new things and enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_2.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it.

content.text: i've been traveling the world for a years
